SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_ELV_NAIN_000_0190.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_ELV_NAIN_000_0190.text: It's not working at the moment.

SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_020.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_020.text:
Central Lift
'Green Section ←→ Yellow Section'
connection is now available on the lower level.

SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_030.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_030.text:
Central Lift
'Yellow Section ←→ Red Section'
connection is now available on the lower level.

SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_040.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_040.text:
Central Lift
'Green Section ←→ Red Section'
connection is now available on the lower level.

SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_050.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_FUNC_COMM_KYE_CUT_000_050.text:
Central Lift
You can now take the moving
platform to the abandoned zone.

SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_001_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_001_CUT_000.text:
An alarm has sounded. It seems
to be emitting high-frequency
waves for repelling vermin.

SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_001_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_001_CUT_010.text:
These seem to be high-frequency
waves for repelling vermin.

SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_001_CUT_020.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_001_CUT_020.text:
This could probably cancel out
the screams of a monophid.

SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_200_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_200_CUT_000.text:
The alarm is already blaring,
emitting high-frequency waves.

SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_200_CUT_020.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_LIF_ALERT_01_200_CUT_020.text: There's no need to operate this now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_080_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_080_CUT_010.text:
You can use this to deactivate
the electromagnetic gates.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_01_000_CUT_.speaker: HERO
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_01_000_CUT_.text:
Better bring this to the
Red Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_01_000_CUT_.speaker: HERO
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_01_000_CUT_.text:
I'll hold on to this.
It might come in handy.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_000_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_000_CUT_000.text: Welcome to the Department of Inventions.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_000_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_000_CUT_010.text:
Here you can use gizmo parts and
crystals to make other items.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_010_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_010_CUT_000.text: What would you like to create?

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_010_CUT_070.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_010_CUT_070.text: You don't have enough gizmo parts.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_020_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_020_CUT_010.text: A device that automatically incubates eggs.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_020_CUT_020.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_020_CUT_020.text: An egg incubator has been installed.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_030_CUT_020.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_030_CUT_020.text: A plant cultivation kit has been installed.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_000.text:
You cannot use this facility,
as you have no gizmo parts.

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_010.text: You don't have enough gizmo parts to make this. (4 needed)

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_020.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_020.text: You don't have enough gizmo parts to make this. (4 needed)

SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_030.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_HATUMEI_100_CUT_030.text: You do not have enough crystals to make this. (2 needed)

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_000_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_000_CUT_000.text: Egg Incubator: a device that automatically incubates eggs.

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_000_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_000_CUT_010.text: Will you place a tsuchinoko egg in the incubator?

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_000_CUT_040.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_000_CUT_040.text: You don't have any tsuchinoko eggs.

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_010_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_010_CUT_010.text: Effects vary based on temperature setting.

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_020_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_020_CUT_010.text: It should hatch after more time has passed.

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_030_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_030_CUT_000.text: The egg appears to have hatched. Let's take a look!

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_030_CUT_050.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_030_CUT_050.text: It's a boiled egg. You might as well eat it.

SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_030_CUT_060.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_EGG_030_CUT_060.text: It's a monster. You'll have to fight it.

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_000_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_000_CUT_000.text: Plant Cultivation Kit: A device for cultivating plants.

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_000_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_000_CUT_010.text: Will you plant an enhanced monophid seed?

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_000_CUT_040.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_000_CUT_040.text: You don't have any enhanced monophid seeds.

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_020_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_020_CUT_010.text: It should sprout after more time has passed.

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_000.text: The plant is grown. Let's harvest it.

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_040.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_040.text: It turned into a monster! You have to fight it!

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_050.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_050.text: You grew three enhanced monophid seeds.

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_060.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_060.text: A tsuchinoko egg emerged from the fruit!

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_100.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_100.text: A crystal emerged from the fruit!

SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_120.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_COMM_SEED_030_CUT_120.text: You grew an enhanced monophid seed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_000_CUT_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_000_CUT_000.text:
Say, that's a crystal!
Oh, just look how it sparkles...
Don't suppose you'd trade it
for an enhanced monophid seed?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_000_CUT_020.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_000_CUT_020.text:
How about one crystal for one
enhanced monophid seed?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_010_CUT_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_010_CUT_000.text:
If you get any crystals,
bring them to me and I'll give
you enhanced monophid seeds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_030_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_030_CUT_010.text:
You traded a crystal for an
enhanced monophid seed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_030_CUT_020.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_030_CUT_020.text: You got an enhanced monophid seed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_000_CUT_000.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey, that's an enhanced monophid seed!
Those things are delicious.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_000_CUT_020.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_000_CUT_020.text: Wanna trade for a tsuchinoko egg?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_010_CUT_000.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_010_CUT_000.text:
Bring me enhanced monophid seeds
and I'll trade 'em for eggs.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_030_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_030_CUT_010.text:
You traded an enhanced monophid seed
for a tsuchinoko egg.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_000_CUT_000.speaker: GreenTribe_ScholarI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, that's a tsuchinoko egg!
I want one of those bad!

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_000_CUT_020.speaker: GreenTribe_ScholarI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_000_CUT_020.text:
Would you trade it
for a crystal?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_010_CUT_000.speaker: GreenTribe_ScholarI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_010_CUT_000.text:
Bring me a tsuchinoko egg and
I'll trade you a crystal.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_030_CUT_010.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_030_CUT_010.text:
You traded a tsuchinoko egg
for a crystal.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey, is that a page from a
cursed tome you got there?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_000_CUT_02.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_000_CUT_02.text:
Er, I mean, care to trade it
for two crystals?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_030_CUT_01.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_030_CUT_01.text:
You traded a cursed scrap
of paper for crystals.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, is that a piece of the
philosopher's stone?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Would you trade it for
two tsuchinoko eggs?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_030_CUT_0.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_030_CUT_0.text:
You traded a philosopher's stone fragment (?)
for tsuchinoko eggs.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_000_CUT_.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_000_CUT_.text:
Goodness! Is that a fragment
of a mysterious sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_000_CUT_.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_000_CUT_.text:
Would you trade it for two
enhanced monophid seeds?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_020_CUT_.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_020_CUT_.text:
Okay, fine. I'll give you three
enhanced monophid seeds!

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_030_CUT_.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_030_CUT_.text:
You traded a mysterious sword fragment (?)
for enhanced monophid seeds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_030_CUT_.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_030_CUT_.text: You got two enhanced monophid seeds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_030_CUT_.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_030_CUT_.text: You got three enhanced monophid seeds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_999_CUT_000_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_999_CUT_000_000.text:
A reward for completing the quest
of the life sciences group.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_01_000_CUT_.speaker: UI
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_01_000_CUT_.text:
The electromagnetic gates were active!
You lost LP from the shock.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_000.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_000.text:
Ho there, friend! There's something important
I need to tell you about that sword you're
safeguarding. Be a dear and summon the
acting overseer here, would you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_010.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_010.text:
The acting overseer is incredibly busy
at the moment. We're just about to
bring Specimen 440 under control.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_020.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_020.text:
In that case, you must take me to the sword
at once. Without it, any attempt to stop
the Beast King will end in failure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_040.text: Okay, so the thing is, that sword is cursed in a very particular way, in that you need a command word to unlock its power. As a member of Red Division, you should be familiar with the concept.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_050.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_050.text:
All right. Then tell me the command word
so I can inform the acting overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_060.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_060.text:
Oh, if only it were so easy as that!
Er, but it's not. No, no. How about this: I'll unlock the sword's power,
and then you deliver it to the acting overseer.
Quickly now! Time is very short!

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_070.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_070.text: I dunno. This seems like a trick.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_080.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_080.text:
You're wearing a full combat suit!
What 'trick' could I possibly...

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_100.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_100.text:
Ha! I'm the overseer of Red Division,
and I know every weakness of those suits!

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_110.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_012_CUT_110.text: Hold on, Beast King! I'm coming!

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_UDETAMESHI_000_CUT_020.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_UDETAMESHI_000_CUT_020.text:
You know! Just have a little fight with
some of Red Division's choicest monsters?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_UDETAMESHI_001_CUT_070.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_UDETAMESHI_001_CUT_070.text:
Now you're talking!
So what did you have in mind?

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_UDETAMESHI_001_CUT_110.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_UDETAMESHI_001_CUT_110.text:
Tsk! Whatever, Captain Buzzkill.
Come by later if you find your guts!

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: BLANK_NAME
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_08.text:
Red Division Soldier Ni Hill
Codename: Beast King

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: BLANK_NAME
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_09.text:
Cycle 204,031: Beast King steals
cursed sword from Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_10.speaker: BLANK_NAME
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_10.text:
Cycle 204,045: Beast King lives on despite
being infected in slime mold experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_11.speaker: BLANK_NAME
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_11.text:
Cycle 204,137: Beast King goes on violent
rampage due to effects of curse.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_12.speaker: BLANK_NAME
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_12.text:
Cycle 204,140: Beast King is
sealed away as Specimen 440.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_13.speaker: BLANK_NAME
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_13.text:
Count 207,232: Beast King
seemingly returns to life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_14.speaker: BLANK_NAME
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_14.text:
Count 207,233: Beast King is sealed
away once more as Specimen 440A.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Connection_Operator
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Internal door locked...
Safety device engaged...
Pressurizing...

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Administrator Gold has entered
the connectivity chamber. Unable to establish a connection.
The connectivity chamber is
currently not conjoined.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Connection_Operator
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Closing external door...
Closure confirmed...
Pressurizing...

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Administrator Gold has gone 'outside.'
This is a gross violation of all
Administrative Division policy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_COMM_RETURN_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Erase all records of Administrator Gold.
We must select a new administrator.
